DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare real-world effectiveness BFC FSC asthma patient new ICS/LABA combination therapy population U.S. health plan enrollees .
DOC.detailed_description: A U.S. retrospective database analysis evaluate comparative effectiveness budesonide/formoterol fluticasone propionate/salmeterol among asthma patient
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Continuous health plan enrollment 12 month index Rx At least two prescription fill BFC FSC within 12 month Asthma claim diagnosis , 12 64 year age time first prescription Evidence COPD Claims diagnosis inflammatory diseases cancer Presence Rx one type ICS/LABA combination index date Chronic steroid use Xolair use prior ICS/LABA index treatment
